channel.description: Recent content in Egu18s on Yair Mau | Environmental Modeling | The Hebrew University of Jerusalem

item.title: EGU 2018
item.description: From April 8 to 13 I’ll be in Vienna for the 2018 EGU meeting. I’m presenting a poster on Thursday 12, at Hall X3, board number X3.160, from 17:30 to 19:00. The poster is entitled “Drought resilience of dryland ecosystems under spatial periodic forcing”. You are invited to talk to me, and to find more details, download the png of my poster.
